name: Violence
description: Content that includes physical force intended to hurt or kill someone. Warning users can help them avoid distressing material.

name: Graphic Images
description: Visual content that is highly detailed and potentially disturbing. Flagging this can prevent shock and discomfort.

name: Gore
description: Content that involves extreme violence, often with graphic injury details. This can be deeply unsettling for many users.

name: Nudity
description: Content that depicts unclothed bodies. Warning users can help maintain appropriate viewing environments.

name: Sexual Content
description: Material with explicit sexual themes. It may be inappropriate or uncomfortable for some viewers.

name: Profanity
description: Use of offensive language. Some users may prefer to avoid such content.

name: Hate Speech
description: Content that promotes hatred against a particular group. This can be harmful and distressing.

name: Racism
description: Content that discriminates or promotes prejudice against races. It is important to flag to prevent harm and distress.

name: Sexism
description: Content that discriminates based on gender. This can be hurtful and offensive to many users.

name: Homophobia
description: Content that discriminates against or shows prejudice towards LGBTQ+ individuals. Flagging helps protect users from harmful biases.

name: Transphobia
description: Content that discriminates against transgender individuals. Warning users can prevent exposure to harmful material.

name: Ableism
description: Content that discriminates against individuals with disabilities. It is important to flag to prevent harm and distress.

name: Misogyny
description: Content that shows contempt or prejudice against women. This can be deeply offensive and harmful.

name: Suicide
description: Content discussing or depicting self-inflicted death. Warning users can help protect vulnerable individuals.

name: Self-Harm
description: Content related to harming oneself. This can be triggering and harmful to viewers.

name: Eating Disorders
description: Content discussing or depicting unhealthy eating behaviors. Warning users can prevent triggering material.

name: Mental Health Issues
description: Content dealing with psychological disorders. Flagging can help protect those who may be sensitive to these topics.

name: Substance Abuse
description: Content involving the misuse of drugs or alcohol. This can be distressing and triggering for some users.

name: Alcohol
description: Content involving the consumption or promotion of alcoholic beverages. Some users may prefer to avoid such material.

name: Smoking
description: Content depicting the use of tobacco products. Warning users can help them avoid such content.

name: Drug Use
description: Content showing the consumption of drugs. This can be triggering or distressing.

name: Addiction
description: Content discussing compulsive behaviors. It is important to warn users who may be affected by these topics.

name: Child Abuse
description: Content depicting or discussing harm to children. This is highly sensitive and distressing material.

name: Animal Abuse
description: Content involving harm to animals. This can be very upsetting for many users.

name: Domestic Violence
description: Content related to violence within the home. This can be triggering and deeply upsetting.

name: Abduction/Kidnapping
description: Content involving the forceful taking of individuals. This can be very distressing.

name: Torture
description: Content involving severe physical or psychological pain. This is highly disturbing material.

name: War
description: Content depicting armed conflict. It can be upsetting and distressing to many users.

name: Terrorism
description: Content related to acts of terror. This can be highly distressing and frightening.

name: Natural Disasters
description: Content involving events like earthquakes, floods, and hurricanes. This can be distressing for viewers.

name: Graphic Medical Content
description: Detailed depictions of medical procedures. This can be unsettling for many users.

name: Death/Dying
description: Content discussing or depicting death. It can be distressing for many viewers.

name: Murder
description: Content involving the intentional killing of a person. This is highly disturbing material.

name: Stalking
description: Content involving obsessive following or harassment. This can be deeply unsettling.

name: Harassment
description: Content involving aggressive pressure or intimidation. This is harmful and distressing material.

name: Bullying
description: Content involving repeated aggressive behavior. This can be deeply upsetting and harmful.

name: Incest
description: Content involving sexual relations between family members. This is highly disturbing and sensitive material.

name: Pedophilia
description: Content involving sexual attraction to children. This is illegal and deeply disturbing material.

name: Graphic descriptions of Illness
description: Detailed accounts of diseases and ailments. This can be unsettling for some users.

name: Religious Intolerance
description: Content showing prejudice against specific religions. This can be harmful and offensive.

name: Cult Activity
description: Content involving manipulative and harmful group practices. This can be disturbing and harmful.

name: Body Shaming
description: Content criticizing or mocking someone's body. This can be deeply harmful and offensive.

name: Fatphobia
description: Content showing prejudice against overweight individuals. This can be harmful and offensive.

name: Eating/Drinking Disorders
description: Content involving unhealthy eating or drinking behaviors. This can be triggering and harmful.

name: Infidelity
description: Content involving cheating in relationships. This can be distressing for many viewers.

name: Financial Problems
description: Content discussing economic difficulties. This can be stressful and distressing.

name: Homelessness
description: Content involving lack of shelter. This can be distressing and upsetting.

name: Poverty
description: Content involving severe economic deprivation. This can be distressing and upsetting.

name: Gambling
description: Content involving betting or wagering. This can be harmful for some users.

name: Miscarriage/Stillbirth
description: Content involving the loss of a pregnancy. This is highly sensitive and distressing material.

name: Blood/Injury
description: Content depicting bleeding or injuries. This can be unsettling for many users.

name: Animal Death
description: Content depicting the death of animals. This can be very upsetting for viewers.

name: Child Death
description: Content involving the death of a child. This is highly sensitive and distressing material.

name: Miscarriage
description: Content involving the loss of a pregnancy. This is highly sensitive and distressing material.

name: Infant Death
